page.title: 10A Child's Saturday in Keyham
page.content: On Saturday, 15th June, I got up at 6.30 am. I had cornflakes and a cup of tea for breakfast. At about 7.30 I went to play basketball at my friend's house. I go to Leicester Karate Club on Saturdays so at 9.00 my dad took us to Leicester. They went shopping and picked me up at 11.30. My dad's car is a Ford Sierra Ghia (B reg). My younger brother was at home videoing{The {Saturday Picture Show}from the television. We have a{Panasonic}video recorder. We got home at 12.00 and I watched what my brother had recorded while mum prepared the hot-dogs for our lunch. At 1.30 pm I went out to play with my friend. My brother went to his friend's house. They played teddy fights over the settee! I had sandwiches for tea at 6.00 and after watching{Jason and the Argonauts}on television I went to bed at 10.00 pm.
